examples.example: 我们应该多为别人着想，这样世界会更加美好。

translate.english: We should think more about others, so that the world will be more beautiful.

examples.example: 我们要善于发现别人的优点，然后向其学习。

translate.english: We should be good at discovering the merits of others and then learn from them.

examples.example: 我们要真心地帮助别人，这样也能让自己收获快乐。

translate.english: We should sincerely help others, and in this way we can also make ourselves gain happiness.
